definition: the periodic rise and fall of the sea level under the gravitational pull of the moon, be carried with the tide
details:
noun
- the periodic rise and fall of the sea level under the gravitational pull of the moon
- something that may increase or decrease (like the tides of the sea)
= example: something that may increase or decrease (like the tides of the sea)
- there are usually two high and two low tides each day
= synonyms: lunar time period
verb
- be carried with the tide
- cause to float with the tide
- rise or move forward
= synonyms: surge
